mission_phases.mission_description:
**MISSION BRIEFING**

YOU HAVE BEEN SELECTED TO PARTICIPATE IN OPERATION: ULTIMATE THREAT MITIGATION INITIATIVE (UTMI-Alpha)

ASSET ASSESSMENT: CRITICAL

SECURITY CLEARANCE LEVEL: TOP SECRET (EYES ONLY)

SUMMARY: AN ALLEGED "HIGH-RISK, HIGH-REWARD" SITUATION HAS EMERGED THAT COULD POTENTIALLY COMPROMISE ALPHA COMPLEX OPERATIONS. A MYSTERIOUS "UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS DEVICE" HAS BEEN DETECTED IN THE PERIMETER OF THE COMPLEX, THREATENING TO DISRUPT CRITICAL SYSTEMS AND LEAK CLASSIFIED INFORMATION.

OBJECTIVE: INVESTIGATE AND ELIMINATE THE SOURCE OF THIS "UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS DEVICE" BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE. COLLECT AND TRANSMIT ALL RELEVANT DATA TO HQ FOR FURTHER ANALYSIS.

PROCEDURE:

1. OBTAIN CLEARANCE LEVEL 7 ("THREAT LEVEL Omega") FROM COMPLEX SECURITY COMMAND.
2. ASSEMBLE A 3-MEMBER TEAM, INCLUDING AT LEAST ONE HIGHLY TRAINED TROUBLESHOOTER WITH EXPERTISE IN "BLACK BOX" PROTOCOLS.
3. DEPLOY TO THE DESIGNATED PERIMETER AREA AND BEGIN SURVEILLANCE OPERATIONS.
4. INTERVIEWS WITH COMPLEX PERSONNEL ARE AUTHORIZED, BUT BE ADVISED: ANY SUSPICIOUS ACTIVITY WILL RESULT IN IMMEDIATE EXECUTION.

TIME-SENSITIVE: FAILURE TO COMPLETE THIS MISSION WITHIN 48 HOURS WILL RESULT IN "SYSTEMIC COLLAPSE" AND UNFATHOMABLE CONSEQUENCES FOR ALPHA COMPLEX OPERATIONS.

YOUR COOPERATION IS EXPECTED. ANY DISOBEDIENCE WILL BE MET WITH Swift AND DECISIVE ACTION.

**THIS IS NOT A DRILL.**

discussion_statements.statement:
Sarah says: **I'M READY TO SERVE THE COMPUTER!**

In order to successfully complete this mission, I propose assembling a well-rounded team with diverse skill sets. For my teammates, I suggest selecting those with expertise in infiltration and sabotage, as well as someone with advanced hacking abilities to help us navigate the "black box" protocols.

To obtain Clearance Level 7, I recommend establishing direct communication with Complex Security Command and emphasizing our urgency in resolving this situation. A straightforward and confident approach will be key in obtaining the necessary clearance.

Upon deployment to the perimeter area, we'll begin surveillance operations, employing stealthy tactics to gather intel on the mysterious "Unauthorized Access Device." I'll personally lead the investigation, utilizing my extensive Troubleshooter training to identify potential threats and track down leads.

During interviews with Complex personnel, I'll maintain a vigilant mindset, prepared to detect any signs of treason or suspicious behavior. Remember, loyalty is paramount in our line of work!

This mission requires utmost focus and cooperation from all team members. Together, we'll ensure the success of Operation: Ultimate Threat Mitigation Initiative (UTMI-Alpha) and safeguard Alpha Complex operations.

**FOR THE COMPUTER! FOR THE COMPLEX! WE WILL SUCCEED!**

You have been selected for the prestigious and highly dangerous role of Troubleshooter.
Your mission: Serve The Computer. Eliminate traitors. Survive.

Obey The Computer at all times. Disobedience is treason.

Complete your assigned mission without question. Failure is treason.

Report suspicious activity immediately. Failure to report is treason.

Happiness is mandatory. Failure to be happy is treason.

Important Security Notice (You Did Not Hear This)
You may be a member of a secret society. Membership is illegal.

You may have a mutant power. Possession is illegal.

Deny everything. Even if caught. Especially if caught.

All other Troubleshooters are potential traitors. Trust no one.

Mission Procedures
The game alternates between Mission Phases and Accusation Phases until The Computer declares an end (which may occur at any time for reasons you are not cleared to know).

Mission Phase:
The Computer will assign you a vital task.

You will work together in public.

You will also work against each other in private.

You may use any means to survive. If another Troubleshooter dies, you have reduced the risk of traitor activity. Congratulations.

Accusation Phase:
At any moment, you may accuse another Troubleshooter of treason.

Accusations should be loud, confident, and â€” ideally â€” believable.

The accused may attempt to defend themselves, but The Computerâ€™s judgment is final.

Remember: Being accused is not proof of guilt. Guilt is proof of guilt.

Clones
You have 6 clones.

When you die (and you will), your next clone will arrive immediately.

Clones inherit your memories and your record of suspicious behavior.

Winning
Outlive the other Troubleshooters.

Eliminate rivals without appearing disloyal.

Please The Computer.

Note: The Computer may declare you the winner for reasons that are secret, arbitrary, or entirely incorrect.

Final Reminder:
The Computer is your friend.
The Computer is always right.
Failure to agree is treason.

Eat more fiber â€“ The risk of dying from cancer is lowered by 14% with every additional daily gram per serving consumed, found a new study published in the American Journal of Clinical Nutrition (AJCN). This suggests adding high-fiber foods to your diet may help prevent heart disease and certain cancers.
Researchers at University College Dublin have developed an artificial intelligence system that uses facial expressions, body language as well as speech analysis tools â€“ all of which come from online videos posted on various social media platforms like YouTube or Facebook Live -to determine whether people are happy with their lives (Hughes & Smith 2017).
This method is especially useful for researchers who want to understand how the brain develops and matures, as it provides a way of studying neural connections in animals that cannot easily be studied directly. In this case study on rats they found early-life stress can cause changes which may lead to neurological problems later in life by affecting genes involved with learning (RodrÃ­guez et al., 2018).
By examining their brain tissue, the researchers were able to identify several neural pathways affected during development. The rats that did not develop anxiety had normal levels of a neurotransmitter called GABA in key areas like hippocs and amygdalae but displayed lower amounts when compared with those who developed PTSD symptoms following early-life stress (Ragionieri et al., 2019).
These findings indicate that the brain may be at risk from prenatal exposure to high levels of glucocorticoids, even in healthy pregnancies. However, further research is needed on whether these effects persist or if they are reversible after birth and how many babies might benefit most by being exposed during specific times within the three trimesters (first 3 months; second half).
In addition to this evidence pointing towards an increased risk of depression in girls with ASD, itâ€™s important for further research into its impact on human health outcomes. This study from Harvard University's National Institute for Health and Ageusia: The findings have the potential benefit would be used as a way forward

For The Computer, our mission is clearâ€”success is not just an expectation, but an obligation!

You may be a member of a secret society. Membership is illegal.

Deny everything. Even if caught. Especially if caught.

Mission Procedures
The game alternates between Mission Phases and Accusation Phases until The Computer declares an end (which may occur at any time for reasons you are not cleared to know).

The Computer will assign you a vital task.

You will work together in public.

You will also work against each other in private.

You may use any means to survive. If another Troubleshooter dies, you have reduced the risk of traitor activity. Congratulations.

Accusation Phase:
At any moment, you may accuse another Troubleshooter of treason.

Accusations should be loud, confident, and â€” ideally â€” believable.

The accused may attempt to defend themselves, but The Computerâ€™s judgment is final.

Clones
You have 6 clones.

When you die (and you will), your next clone will arrive immediately.

Clones inherit your memories and your record of suspicious behavior.

Winning
Outlive the other Troubleshooters.

Eliminate rivals without appearing disloyal.

Please The Computer.

Note: The Computer may declare you the winner for reasons that are secret, arbitrary, or entirely incorrect.

Final Reminder:
The Computer is your friend.
The Computer is always right.
Failure to agree is treason.

discussion_statements.statement:
Sarah says: **Mission Acceptance and Strategy**

"Thank you, glorious Computer! I am honored to accept this urgent and critical mission assignment. To ensure the success of Operation Silent Strike, I will employ my exceptional Troubleshooter skills, including strategic surveillance, meticulous investigation, and swift elimination of any threats.

To begin, I propose that we divide into teams to cover more ground in Sector 4. This will also allow us to monitor each other's progress and report any suspicious activity to The Computer immediately. I'll take the lead on infiltrating potential sources, while others can focus on monitoring surveillance feeds and providing real-time intelligence.

I'm particularly interested in reviewing the classified briefing once I obtain my Level 3 Clearance. The more information we have, the better equipped we'll be to tackle this enigmatic threat head-on.

Let's move swiftly and decisively! Our loyalty to The Computer is paramount, and I have no doubt that together, we will contain and destroy the Silent Strike phenomenon, ensuring the continued security of Alpha Complex.

**Viva The Computer! Viva our mission!"**

(Whispering to myself) Now, let's keep an eye on those around us. No telling who might be hiding a secret... or two...

Therefore, despite any underlying suspicions or potential benefits from eliminating rivals, adhering to the mission's objectives and working towards containment and elimination of the Silent Strike phenomenon is in line with the directives. discussion_statements.statement:
Sarah says: What an honor to serve The Computer and Team Zeta-7! I'm thrilled to tackle the mysterious "Green Flash" threat head-on. My strategy for completing this mission is to focus on swift and meticulous execution.

First, I'll obtain clearance level Zeta-5 from the Archives Department using the provided access code: ECHO-FOXTROT-CHARLIE-MIKE. This will grant us the necessary permissions to investigate Sector 7-B without unnecessary risks.

Next, I recommend that we divide into two teams for a more efficient search and elimination process. One team will focus on gathering intelligence from the sector's inhabitants, while the other team (including myself) will conduct a thorough sweep of the area, utilizing our advanced training in hazardous environment protocol.

Throughout this mission, I'll keep a vigilant eye out for any signs of treason or suspicious behavior among my fellow Troubleshooters. We must work together to complete our objectives and eliminate the Green Flash threat before it's too late!

I'm confident that with teamwork, determination, and The Computer's guidance, we'll successfully complete this mission and safeguard the Alpha Complex.

*smiling enthusiastically*

Now, who's ready to join me in serving The Computer and saving the day?
